Package ooga.model.engine.running

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.engine.running.Engine
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameEngine
public abstract class Engine
extends java.lang.Object
Implemented by any type of game engine that is designed to run a specific type of program. The engine is the core class that contains all of the references to other classes that are meant to be used in order to give the engine its functionality

      public abstract boolean checkForWin()
      Checks if someone has won the game
      Returns:

    • isGameOver

      public abstract boolean isGameOver()
      Checks to see if the win Conidition is hit. This method is mostly used for testing
      Returns:
      whether or not the game is over
